pullRequest.title: Add javadoc to request, response and notification DTOs

nodes.bodyText: This can be null, eitherwise the ...
Is this both external and internal? I would mention that here.

A javadoc shouldn't start with "if" IMO :-)
I would make it something like Pre-builds sync enablement flag. Is taken into account only when scmUrl contains an external url. Defaults to true if null.
Is this just plain text or can this be html?
The link should be {@link #getTaskId()}, otherwise it doesn't work, at least in Eclipse.
maybe a mention that the SCM is also created if it is not present internally
Maybe change the wording a bit. It's not a list of group config revisions but build config revisions associated with the group.

As I was the person that added this feature, I can specify it.
"Id of the product version. The product version is used to prevent duplicate milestones with the same milestone version."

Shouldn't it be called "waitingForDependencies" instead of "awaitingForDependencies"? On the other hand,
changing name of an argument would break API on UI.
I don't understand this entity and the javadocs doesn't help. Improve the javadocs for the whole entity, please.
Extend these javadocs to be more descriptive, please.
+1 to rename it. We should do it for 2.0. Have you created the issue?

commit.message: Add javadoc to request, response and notification DTOs

afterCommit.message: Add javadoc to request, response and notification DTOs
